title: animint2 gallery
output: html_document
---

```{r Ropts, echo=FALSE}
options(width=200)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo=FALSE,
  results="asis")
ahref <- function(href, text){
  sprintf('<a href="%s">%s</a>', href, text)
}
```

```{r}
myread <- function(csv, repo.col){
  nc::capture_first_df(
    fread(csv),
    repo=list(user=".*?", "/", repo_only=".*")
  )[
  , img.png := sprintf("repos/%s.png", repo)
  ][
  , viz.link := ahref(
    sprintf("https://%s.github.io/%s/", user, repo_only),
    ifelse(
      file.exists(img.png),
      sprintf('<img src="%s" alt="%s" />', img.png, repo),
      repo)
  )][
  , repo.link := ahref(
    sprintf("https://github.com/%s/tree/gh-pages", repo),
    get(repo.col))
  ]
}
meta.dt <- myread("meta.csv", "title")[
  , source.link := ahref(
    source,
    commit.POSIXct)
]
error.dt <- myread("error.csv", "repo")
```

```{r}
knitr::kable(meta.dt[, .(
  viz.link, repo.link, source.link
)])
download <- function(csv){
  cat(ahref(csv, paste("Download this table: ", csv)))
}
download("meta.csv")
```

## Visualizations with missing meta-data

```{r}
knitr::kable(error.dt[, .(
  viz.link, repo.link, error
)])
download("error.csv")
```
